update.description: In Windows, dll \(both shared libraries and plugins\) are installed under the `<prefix>/bin`, and for example this is enforced in `vcpkg` .
update.title: Modify build system to install dll in <prefix>/bin by default on Windows

content.raw:
Imported this patch into current gazebo10 branch, results:

* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia&build=33)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-ubuntu\_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/33/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/33/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64&build=2627)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-windows7-amd64/2627/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2627/))


* ![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64&build=1788)

    [https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr\_any-homebrew-amd64/1788/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1788/))



I don’t see any new failure. Thanks Silvio!
content.html:
Imported this patch into current gazebo10 branch, results:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-ubuntu_auto-amd64-gpu-nvidia/33/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-windows7-amd64/2627/)

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-ci-pr_any-homebrew-amd64/1788/)

I don’t see any new failure. Thanks Silvio!

content.raw:
This is a breaking change \(in the sense that files are going to be installed in a different directory\), so I am targeting gazebo11 .

cc @{5bee878f5416561374c46bd9}
content.html:
This is a breaking change (in the sense that files are going to be installed in a different directory), so I am targeting gazebo11 .

cc @Sean Yen
